Paragraph: Congratulations! We are pleased to confirm that you have been selected to work for XXX We are delighted to make you the following job offer. The position we are offering you is that of consultant at a monthly salary YYYY with an annual cost to company ZZZZ. This position reports to Paul Saint, Group head of the division. Your working hours will be from 9AM to 6PM, Starting Monday to Friday
Simplification: You have been offered a job.

Paragraph: Your performance is based on the annual report and shall be variable depending on your performance and overall company net profit
